reviewText:
C.J. Caracci knows his business. This video is not about manipulation or handling. It's about tactics for using a shotgun for sef defense in and around your home. NOBODY else really covers this aspect of using a shotgun.
There' s no stance, speed loading, select slug drills here. if you don't already know the basics, this video is not for you.
A great training video at a very good price. Any material by C.J. Caracci is top notch and this video is no exception. If you have a chance to buy one of these videos, you won't be disappointed.
